Articles.Content:
Well for the last few months (lost track) I\'ve been intoxicated by Kerbal! Since around 13.1 when I discovered KSP I soon realised I\'d love this game and that it had massive potential. Ever since I\'ve been creating missile after rocket (lots of death and explosions =P ) and trying to keep up with the \'out of this Kerbin galaxy\' fast development rate you guys at Squad are going at...Truley amazing how the game has developed, It looks stunning and plays like a charm.

Which is why I think now is a good time to share my endeavours and creations, as i believe I\'ve created (out of many great and wonderful mods, thanks everyone who is due) 3 pretty cool ships.

The first ship came about from all the aborted attempts and epic fails, with the want to use this certain mod and is officially my 1st successful and stable :-X...design.

Spider Lander-White Widow

The other two ships I\'ll post sometime tomorrow......

Ok so I never got round to posting the other ships

BUT I have made a video! ??? ;D

Although the reason why I never got round to posting the ships is mainly down to getting carried away playing the game.

So at the beginning of the video is what I had been doing instead ;P and followed by a demo of the The MonoTek - Mun Orbiter.

Video;

http://youtu.be/hgcJjwma5lg

More videos to follow of the other ships and a demo of what they \'should\' do. :
